scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.depchart-types: depchart `find src | grep '/types/' | grep .ts` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-types --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-notypes: depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude `find src | grep '/util/'` `find src | grep '/test/'` `find src | grep '/types/'` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-notypes --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-most: depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude `find src | grep '/util/'` `find src | grep '/test/'` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-most --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-most-loose: depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude `find src | grep '/test/'` --loose --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-most-loose --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart: yarn run depchart-notypes && yarn run depchart-types && yarn run depchart-most && yarn run depchart-most-loose
